metadata.title: CVE-2021-33582 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cyrus IMAP before 3.4.2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (multiple-minute daemon hang) via input that is mishandled duringhash-table interaction. Because there are many insertions into a singlebucket, strcmp becomes slow. This is fixed in 3.4.2, 3.2.8, and 3.0.16.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
